mapper.select: SELECT BAN.BANNER_IDX, BAN.CATEGORY_IDX, (SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_IDX = BAN.CATEGORY_IDX) CATEGORY_NAME, BAN.BANNER_TITLE, BAN.BANNER_SUB_TITLE, BAN.BANNER_ORDER FROM BANNER BAN ORDER BY BAN.BANNER_ORDER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BANNER ( BANNER_IDX, CATEGORY_IDX, BANNER_TITLE, BANNER_SUB_TITLE, BANNER_ORDER ) VALUES ( #{bannerIdx}, #{categoryIdx}, #{bannerTitle}, #{bannerSubTitle}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(BANNER_ORDER),0) + 1 FROM BANNER) )

INSERT INTO SHOP_FILE ( FILE_IDX, POST_IDX, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME, FILE_EXTENTION_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_ORDER, FILE_TYPE ) VALUES ( #{fileIdx}, #{postIdx}, #{originalFileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileName}, #{fileExtentionName}, #{fileSize}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(FILE_ORDER),0) + 1 FROM SHOP_FILE WHERE POST_IDX = #{postIdx}), #{fileType} )
mapper.select: SELECT BN.BANNER_IDX, BN.CATEGORY_IDX, BN.BANNER_TITLE, BN.BANNER_SUB_TITLE, BN.BANNER_ORDER, (SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_IDX = BN.CATEGORY_IDX) CATEGORY_NAME FROM BANNER BN WHERE BN.BANNER_IDX = #{value}
SELECT FILE_IDX, POST_IDX, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME, FILE_EXTENTION_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_ORDER, FILE_TYPE FROM SHOP_FILE WHERE POST_IDX = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE BANNER SET CATEGORY_IDX = #{categoryIdx}, BANNER_TITLE = #{bannerTitle}, BANNER_SUB_TITLE = #{bannerSubTitle} WHERE BANNER_IDX = #{bannerIdx}
